notes: If two cards, use Royal second to draw 2 new cards.
Use Quadra Accelerate or Scratch Dealer to gain 4 stacks with the effect of Balance.
Use autoattacks to reach 4 stacks with the effect of Three-Headed Snake.
Use within 30s of next Awakening use, otherwise use before Celestial Rain.
Use after Celestial Rain. If in Boundless MP state (Nightmare Set effect), use before Celestial Rain hits after its cooldown starts.
Standard 4 stacks, buff, and ruin skill combo.
With Cull, Serendipity becomes a viable option because it benefits a lot from the effects of Cull.
With Judgment, prioritize Serendipity for the double full-stack damage.
In most cases Celestial Rain is more practical. The Awakening skill combo can be used for speedrunning easier content.
Prioritized by damage. Serendipity benefits the most from both card effects.
Cull combo with a chance of increased damage.
Apply Wheel of Fortune's cooldown reset on the highest priority Ruin skill.

Perform optimal stacking rotation with Balance and use Serendipity with Cull whenever viable.
Apply Wheel of Fortune's cooldown reset on the highest priority Ruin skill.
